config.enable-mod.name: Enable Mod
config.enable-mod.desc: When enabled, this mod will function.
config.any-tool.section.tooltip: This section contains options that will apply to any type of tool. If options for a more specific type of tool are enabled (e.g. if Watering Can options are enabled when using a watering can), those specific options will override options in this section.
config.any-tool.enabled.name: Enable for any tool
config.any-tool.enabled.desc: When enabled, options from this section will be applied to any type of tool.
config.watering-can.section.tooltip: This section contains options that will apply specifically to watering cans.
config.watering-can.enabled.name: Enable for Watering Cans
config.watering-can.enabled.desc: When enabled, options from this section will be applied to watering cans.
config.hoe.section.tooltip: This section contains options that will apply specifically to hoes.
config.hoe.enabled.name: Enable for Hoes
config.hoe.enabled.desc: When enabled, options from this section will be applied to hoes.
